marklogic.body: Â Jews do all right with "isolated high-quality genetics..." This would be the same Tay Sachs inbred trickle of humanity that Herr Hitler threw up against the wall to the brink of extermination just 70 years ago, correct? Your backwards-azzed HBBD religion has hamstrung, castrated, and lobotomized your capacity for objectively useful operational analysis BD, you may want to seek help in patching the conspicuous holes in your cognitive bucket. Fear not old bean, I'm here to slap you back into Cold, hard sobriety, whenever you Act out expressive of the urgent fact that you need it.....,
